properties.question: Where is the Harappan site of Kalibangan located?
properties.brief: Evidence of the world's earliest ploughed field found here (c. 2500 BCE).

properties.question: When did the Battle of Rajasthan (Pratihara vs Arabs) occur?
properties.brief: Nagabhata I defeated the Umayyad Caliphate, halting the Arab advance.

properties.question: Where did the Kachwaha ruler Dulha Rai establish his first capital?
properties.brief: 1137; the starting point of the Amber/Jaipur kingdom's history.

properties.question: When was the Battle of Tarain fought by Prithviraj Chauhan III?
properties.brief: The first major victory of the Ajmer-Delhi Chauhans against Ghori.

properties.question: Where is the Ranthambore Fort that Alauddin Khalji captured in 1301?
properties.brief: 1301; Hammir Dev Chauhan's final stand and the first recorded Jauhar.

properties.question: When did Rana Hamir Singh recover Chittorgarh from the Sultanate?
properties.brief: Established the Sisodia branch of the Guhila dynasty in Mewar.

properties.question: Where is the invincible fort of Kumbhalgarh located?
properties.brief: Built by Rana Kumbha (1458); features the second longest wall in the world.

properties.question: When was the 'Kirti Stambh' (Tower of Victory) completed?
properties.brief: Built by Rana Kumbha tolebrate victory over the Malwa and Gujarat Sultanates.

properties.question: Where did the Second Saka of Chittorgarh occur under Rani Karnavati?
properties.brief: 1535; during the invasion of Bahadur Shah of Gujarat.

properties.question: When did the Battle of Sammel (Giri-Sumel) take place?
properties.brief: Sher Shah Suri vs Rao Maldeo of Marwar; Sher Shah nearly lost his empire.

properties.question: When did Akbar hold the Nagaur Darbar?
properties.brief: Most Rajput rulers (except Mewar) accepted Mughal suzerainty here.

properties.question: Where is the battlefield of Haldighati located?
properties.brief: 1576; Maharana Pratap's legendary battle against the Mughal army.

properties.question: When did the Battle of Dewair (Mewar's Marathon) occur?
properties.brief: Maharana Pratap's decisive victory in reclaiming the lost territories of Mewar.

properties.question: Where is the Junagarh Fort, built by Raja Rai Singh, located?
properties.brief: 1594; one of the few major forts in Rajasthan not built on a hilltop.

properties.question: When was the Treaty of Amar Singh with Jahangir signed?
properties.brief: Ended decades of Mughal-Mewar conflict on honorable terms.

properties.question: Where did Sawai Jai Singh II found his new capital?
properties.brief: 1727; India's first planned city based on Vastu Shastra.

properties.question: When was the Hurda Conference held to unite Rajputs against Marathas?
properties.brief: Organized by Sawai Jai Singh II, but failed due to mutual distrust.

properties.question: Where is the Lohagarh Fort, which the British failed to capture in 1805?
properties.brief: Built by Maharaja Suraj Mal; considered the only 'iron fort' (unconquerable).

properties.question: When did Mewar sign a Treaty of Subsidiary Alliance with the British?
properties.brief: Signed during the reign of Maharana Bhim Singh, ending Maratha/Pindari raids.

properties.question: Where did the 1857 Revolution begin in Rajasthan?
properties.brief: May 28, 1857; the 15th Bengal Native Infantry revolted against British officers.

properties.question: When was the first step of Rajasthan Integration taken (Matsya Union)?
properties.brief: March 18, 1948; merged Alwar, Bharatpur, Dholpur, and Karauli.

properties.question: Where did the Bijolia Peasant Movement, the longest non-violent struggle, start?
properties.brief: 1897; led by Sitaram Das and later Vijay Singh Pathik.

properties.question: When was the modern state of Rajasthan fully formed?
properties.brief: November 1, 1956; the final 7th stage including Ajmer-Merwara and Abu.

properties.question: Where is the Dargah of Moinuddin Chishti located?
properties.brief: A major Sufi pilgrimage site since the 12thntury.
